name: RE-B00T
description:
Time has come to Reboot the system !

In this nervous top-down beat them up you will face waves of guardians robots protecting the world core process unit that control all AI of the planet and that imprisoned you in the RE-B00T, a sword able to take control of every machines !

- Exploit the power of the RE-B00T to possess the corpses of the enemys you defeated !

- Make series of kills before your sword loses his power and cross the 8 stages of this die and retry that will make you face a hardcore challenge !

Are you ready for an intense rush ?

This game is a student project I producted alone in 2 month on the middle of my first year whose I would like to develop the concept to make a full game in a potential future.
